page.title: 19EVENTS The Derwen Fete
page.content:
The fete raised Â£5,946 in 1985 which was Â£8OO more than last year.The money is spent on providing better houses for the students and more facilites.
The students arrive at 18 years of age. During the first year the pupil is assessed to see what he or she will be most suited to doing. The student travels around the workshops so that the teachers can see what the students like doing.The students stay two years and hopefully they will be able to take a job later.
During the term there are lots of clubs and activities for the students to join. There are discos on Wednesdays and Saturdays.The drama group puts on a play once a term.
